title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 651.4 - Statistical report of medical care, services and supplies provided through medical assistance vendor payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 651.4 - Statistical report of medical care, services and supplies provided through medical assistance vendor payments

State Regulations

Social services districts administering AABD, ADC and MA
shall report semiannually to the department, Office of Research and Statistics, on vendor medical care, using individual record cards, form RS-108, Annual

Record of Vendor Medical Care or an approved local equivalent form. Data for
the half-year January through June, shall be submitted on such form by the
first day of August next succeeding, and data for the complete year, January
through December, shall be submitted on such form by the first day of February
next succeeding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
651.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
